ExampleDefinition.Title: Annotations are Easy!
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the Annotations API to create Text, Line, Box, LineArrow and Custom Annotations in Xaml.
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Annotations are Easy!</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">An introduction to the Annotations API available in the Premium Edition of SciChart.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Shows how to place programmatically, at relative or absolute coordinates:</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - TextAnnotation</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - LineAnnotation</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - LineArrowAnnotation</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - HorizontalLineAnnotation</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - PathAnnotation (custom shapes)</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - BoxAnnotation</Run>
